title: Around the World with Robb Report [SLIDESHOW]
text:
A Global Journey by Private Jet, October 13 through November 4, 2016 
In a little more than a year’s time, 52 fortunate travelers will embark on a one-of-a-kind journey that circumnavigates the globe by private jet, visiting eight storied destinations and staying at some of the world’s most exceptional hotels along the way. Curated by the editors of Robb Report and operated by TCS World Travel, this exclusive expedition has never been done before and will never be repeated. 
The distinguished group of passengers will travel in a custom-designed Boeing 757-200ER outfitted with only 52 VIP seats, each a personal haven that promises the utmost in luxury and comfort. Over the course of 23 days, the guests will undoubtedly forge deep bonds as they share the experience of a lifetime with their fellow globe-trotters. And yet, at each leg of the journey, the individual travelers will choose how to spend their time. They may opt to take part in insider events and excursions carefully crafted by Robb Report editors and on-the-ground experts, or they might explore the magnificent surroundings, bask in their exquisite accommodations, and indulge in culinary pleasures on their own time. Regardless, whether racing Ferraris through the California countryside, finding nirvana at a Balinese spa, yachting off the pink-sand shores of Bermuda, or simply traveling in style from one destination to the next, the passengers will enjoy unsurpassed personal service from the expedition’s dedicated staff of journey managers, flight attendants, chefs, tour guides, and more. 
Pre-boarding festivities commence on the evening of Thursday, October 13, 2016, with a celebratory dinner at the legendary Halekulani Hotel in Honolulu. The next morning, the 52 travelers will take flight, crossing the date line to begin a remarkable, unprecedented voyage around the globe—a page-turning journey like no other. ( robbreport.com/aroundtheworld , 888.971.6759, 206.805.8200)
